Malice takes a [[shinobi]]'s [[chakra]] and imbues a puppet with it, creating a perfect copy of the shinobi. These [[puppet]]s are granted any weapons, techniques, and bloodline techniques they may have. Malice is able to control the puppets from very long distances and without the use of chakra threads.
